00031 /// @file xed-format-options.h 
00032 /// @author Mark Charney   <mark.charney@intel.com> 
00033 
00034 
00035 #ifndef _XED_FORMAT_OPTIONS_H_
00036 # define _XED_FORMAT_OPTIONS_H_
00037 #include "xed-types.h"
00038 
00039 
00040 /// @name Formatting options
00041 //@{
00042 
00043 /// Options for the disasembly formatting functions. Set once during
00044 /// initialization by a calling #xed_format_set_options
00045 ///  @ingroup PRINT
00046 typedef struct {
00047     /// by default, XED prints the hex address before any symbolic name for
00048     /// branch targets. If set to zero, then XED will not print the hex
00049     /// address before a valid symbolic name.
00050     unsigned int hex_address_before_symbolic_name; 
00051 
00052     /// Simple XML output format for the Intel syntax disassembly.
00053     unsigned int xml_a; 
00054     /// Include flags in the XML formatting (must also supply xml_a)
00055     unsigned int xml_f; 
00056 
00057     /// omit unit scale "*1" 
00058     unsigned int omit_unit_scale;
00059 
00060 } xed_format_options_t;
00061 
00062 /// Optionally, customize the disassembly formatting options by passing 
00063 /// in a #xed_format_options_t structure.
00064 /// @ingroup PRINT
00065 XED_DLL_EXPORT void
00066 xed_format_set_options(xed_format_options_t format_options);
00067 //@}
00068 
00069 #endif
